WorkItem.Description:
I manually append a comment node (__var comment = hdoc.CreateComment__, __hdoc__ - an instance of __HtmlDocument__ class, __aNode.AppendChild(comment)__). 
Then I call __hdoc.DocumentNode.OuterHtml__ to see the whole html text. Every comment node in this text is not surronded with common __<--__ and __-->__ symbols, just the text of comment.
